00067 typedef struct {
00069   gchar className[12];
00071   gint32 id;
00073   gint32 ReferenceCount; 
00075   ObitThreadClassInfo *myClassInfo;
00076 #ifdef OBIT_THREADS_ENABLED
00077

00086   GStaticRWLock *myRWLock;

00089   gpointer queue;
00090   gpointer myMutex;
00091   gpointer myRWLock;
00092 #endif  /* OBIT_THREADS_ENABLED */
